(Simplified: 荥)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 條 indicates the sound; 水 (water) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿳ Above to middle and below
    • 炏 [ kài ] grass
    • 冖 [ mì ] cover
    • 水 [ shuǐ ] water, liquid, lotion, juice
①(滎陽)地名，在中國河南省。
滎陽 [ xíng yáng ]: Xingyang city and county in Henan
滎陽市 [ xíng yáng shì ]: Xingyang county level city in Zhengzhou 郑州 , Henan
滎陽縣 [ xíng yáng xiàn ]: Xingyang county in Henan
(Simplified: 荥)

Pictophonetic: 條 indicates the sound; 水 (water) conveys the meaning.

滎字的基本解释

滎
xíng

滎
yíng
均见“荥”。

滎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xíng］
［《廣韻》户扃切，平青，匣。］
亦作“熒2”。“荥1”的繁体字。
(1)水绝小貌。参见“滎水”、“滎澤”。
(2)水名。参见“滎水”。
(3)古泽名。参见“滎澤”。
(4)中医穴位名。
[②]［yīng］
［《集韻》娟營切，平清，影。］
“荥2”的繁体字。
见“滎2瀯”。

滎字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　滎； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页642第23
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?戸扃切，音熒。【說文】絕小水也。　又水名。【書·禹貢】滎波旣豬。【周禮·夏官·職方氏】豫州，其川滎洛。　又滎陽，郡名。【地理通釋】滎陽，漢屬河南，今鄭州滎陽滎澤二縣。　又山名。【山海經】南海之外有滎山，滎水所出。　又【集韻】娟營切，音縈。滎瀯，波浪湧起貌。【郭璞·江賦】漩澴滎瀯。　又【玉篇】【集韻】?烏迥切，音瑩。與濙同。汫濙，小水貌。　又【集韻】縈定切，音鎣。義同。亦作瀅。

考證：〔【書·禹貢】滎波旣道。〕　謹照原文旣道改旣豬。

Ying
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xíng］
["Guangyun" Huhuqie, Pingqing, Xie. ]
Also known as "Ying 2". Traditional characters for "荥1".
(1) The water is absolutely small. See "Xingshui", "Xingze".
(2) Water name. See "Xingshui".
(3) Guze name. See "Xingze".
(4) Names of acupoints in Chinese medicine.
[②]［yīng］
["Ji Yun" Juan Ying cut, calm and clear, shadow. ]
Traditional characters for "荥2".
See "Xing 2 瀯".
Ying
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Shui Zi Department] 　 Ying; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 642 23
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? 戸扃切, Yin Ying. [Said the text] absolutely Xiaoshui.　Also known as water. 【Book·Yugong】Xingbo Dizhu. 【Zhou Li·Xiaguan·Zhi Fang Shi】Yuzhou, its Chuan Yingluo.　Xingyang, the county name. [Geographical Interpretation] Xingyang, belonged to Henan in Han Dynasty, is now the second county of Xingyang and Xingze, Zhengzhou.　Also the name of the mountain. [Shan Hai Jing] Outside the South China Sea, there is Mount Ying, which is out of Yingshui.　[Jiyun] Juanying cut, sound lingering. Xingzhen, the waves are surging. 【Guo Pu·Jiang Fu】Xuan Luo Yingzhen.　[Jade Chapter] [Jiyun]? Wu Jiong cut, Yin Ying. Same as Xi. Xunyi, small water appearance.　 [Ji Yun] Ying Ding cut, sound Ying. The same meaning. Also known as Ying. Textual research: [[Book·Yugong] Ying Bochang Road. 〕　I would like to change the way to the pig according to the original text.
